trans-unit.source: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: Gerencia todos os sistemas de entra na WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> classe é responsável pela coordenação de todos os sistemas de entrada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtros podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um monitor é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Os monitores não podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> controls the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager> controla a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: A área de preparação entrada processa a entrada em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventos.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processe estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pós-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Estágio de pós-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputManager" /> associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputManager" /> associado ao thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The input manager.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de entrada.

trans-unit.source: This class will not be available in Internet zone.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não estará disponível na zona da Internet.

trans-unit.source: for getting the current input manager.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o Gerenciador de entrada atual.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode(System.Windows.PresentationSource)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle entra no modo de menu chamando o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode(System.Windows.PresentationSource)" />.

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Componentes registram delegados com esse evento para responder a um controle de modo de menu do Gerenciador de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o resultado de um teste de clique pode ter mudado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.InputProviders" /> registered with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.InputProviders" /> registrado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of input provides.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a coleção de entrada.

trans-unit.source: for getting the collection of input providers.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a coleção de provedores de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher" /> is in menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher" /> está no modo de menu.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher" /> is in menu mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher" /> estiver no modo de menu; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> propriedade retorna `true` se qualquer menu estiver aberto, e ele retorna `false` se nenhum menus estão abertas.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode(System.Windows.PresentationSource)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle sai do modo de menu chamando o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode(System.Windows.PresentationSource)" />.

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Componentes registram delegados com esse evento para responder a um controle de sair do modo de menu do Gerenciador de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o dispositivo de entrada associado ao evento de entrada mais recente.

trans-unit.source: The input device.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The menu to leave.
trans-unit.target: O menu para sair.

trans-unit.source: Called by components to leave menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por componentes para sair do modo de menu.

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to leave the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Um componente chama esse método para sair do modo de menu do Gerenciador de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages.
trans-unit.target: O `menuSite` libera acesso privilegiado para mensagens de janela.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método faz com que a contagem interna de menus abertos para diminuir e define o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> propriedade `false`, se esse for o último menu para fechar.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="menuSite" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="menuSite" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput" /> handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre após os manipuladores <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput" /> terem terminado de processar a entrada e eventos [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] correspondente terem sido gerados.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um monitor é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Os monitores não podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores anexados a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> invocado na ordem inversa para que os manipuladores adicionados pelos usuários são invocados antes manipuladores no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processe estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pós-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Estágio de pós-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: for adding or removing an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput" /> handlers have finished processing the input.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre após os manipuladores <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput" /> terem terminado de processar a entrada.

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtros podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores anexados a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> invocado na ordem inversa para que os manipuladores adicionados pelos usuários são invocados antes manipuladores no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processe estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pós-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Estágio de pós-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: for adding or removing an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput" /> handlers have finished processing the input, if the input was not canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os manipuladores <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput" /> tiverem terminado de processar a entrada, se a entrada não tiver sido cancelada.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um monitor é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Os monitores não podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores anexados a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> invocado na ordem inversa para que os manipuladores adicionados pelos usuários são invocados antes manipuladores no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processe estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pós-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Estágio de pós-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: for adding or removing an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputManager" /> starts to process the input item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputManager" /> começa a processar o item de entrada.

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtros podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores anexados a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> invocado na ordem inversa para que os manipuladores adicionados pelos usuários são invocados antes manipuladores no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> will cancel the processing of the input.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> cancelará o processamento da entrada.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processe estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pós-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Estágio de pós-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: for adding or removing an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the primary keyboard device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dispositivo primário de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The keyboard device.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de teclado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the primary mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dispositivo primário de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The mouse device.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The input to process.
trans-unit.target: A entrada a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified input synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Processa a entrada especificada de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all input events were handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se todos os eventos de entrada foram tratados; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtros podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um monitor é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Os monitores não podem modificar a área de preparação de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event.
trans-unit.target: A entrada especificada é processada por todos os filtros e os monitores e finalmente é enviada para o elemento apropriado como um evento de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processe estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pós-notificar estágio.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Estágio de pós-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gerenciador de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: for processing the specified input.
trans-unit.target: para processar a entrada especificada.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The menu to enter.
trans-unit.target: O menu a inserir.

trans-unit.source: Called by components to enter menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por componentes para entrar no modo de menu.

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to enter the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Um componente chama esse método para entrar no modo de menu do Gerenciador de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages.
trans-unit.target: O `menuSite` obtém acesso privilegiado para mensagens de janela.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método faz com que a contagem interna dos menus abertos para incrementar e define o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> propriedade `true`, se esse for o primeiro menu Abrir.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="menuSite" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="menuSite" /> é <see langword="null" />.
